nodes.bodyText: @cygnus-x-1 i'm not sure if you have noticed issues with Types but I think this line has introduced a bug. The CompareGraphsNGTest failing was an indication something was wrong. If you see strange issues with types showing up as Unknown then try removing this line. I need to debug more but a heads up.

Please note this should have a CHANGELOG.md entry.
Also a what's new regarding the bug fix will be good. I'll put something together and get you to review it @cygnus-x-1.
